name: Bizarre Evolution
description:
BIZARRE EVOLUTION

Everybody knows how vampires spread their beautiful curse, but no one never looked what happens inside the victim blood.

This is a game about biology... and vampires!!

As a vampire cell, you need to infect the host by absorbing the cells in the bloodstream. Killing specific cells grant you powers to help make this body your new and powerful home.

But be careful, they will attack back and they are strong! Also, the bite left some holes in the person's neck, and there's some sun lights coming. Avoid then or you'll fail and parish.

HOW TO PLAY

The game support Keyboard and Joysticks:

Keyboard
W, A, S, D to move in the bloodstream
1 to Dash and run
2 to become the Mist
3 to stop the time like your master: Dio Brando!

Joystick

Left Stick to move in the bloodstream
X/Square to Dash and run
A/X to become the Mist
B/Circle to stop the time like your master: Dio Brando!
